docs.text: Welcome to the Slime Rancher Modding Wiki In this place, yes. This place. You will learn how to create your very first mod for Slime Rancher. Introduction Slime Rancher Modding Wiki is a modding guide for helping new, and long-time, modders create mods for Slime Rancher 1 / 2 . Key Resources The sidebar is also an option. Slime Rancher Slime Rancher 2 Harmony Patching Tools & Utilities As of now, this guide was started, and written by @ylohkuhl . A modder within the community.
